messages.subject: Pink Floyd wasRe: Cool free stickers
messages.msgSnippet: Was looking around to see what the true background was behind The Wall came upon this interview with Roger Waters and Jim Ladd.
messages.messageBody:
Was looking around to see what the "true" background was behind "The
Wall" came upon this interview with Roger Waters and Jim Ladd.

http://www.pink-floyd.org/artint/119.htm
Interesting
Tracy

messages.subject: Re: Cool free stickers
messages.msgSnippet: ... We ... and ... Have you seen the movie? It s a bit extream and deep {I like extream and deep LOL} But the WHOLE album is a tribute of why we treat our kids
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "hollyfurgason"
<unschooler@s...> wrote:
> --- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "Tracy" <sablehs@y...>
> wrote:
>
> > Thanks, haven't seen them yet. We need some to quote Pink Floyd
> {got
> > me in the mood and I'm listening to them now } Need some for
> > unschooling Bumperstickers that say "We Don't Need No Education,
We
> > Don't Need No Thought Control" <EG>
> > Tracy
>
> My 9yo was just saying that that needs to be the theme song for the
> movie about our family that she's planning! After watching "The
> O'Keefes" for several weeks, she figures we're much more exciting
and
> deserve a feature film.

Have you seen the movie? It's a bit extream and deep {I like extream
and deep LOL} But the WHOLE album is a tribute of why we treat our
kids with respect and stay away from "grounding" them out in to
something 'we will be proud' of.
My sister {who is 10 years older then me} had the album and I have
listened to it for a LONG time {12 or so?}. Interesting enough this
is also the sister that turned out to be a .. you guessed it.. a
school teacher. With all the qualities she once rebelled against.

http://www.epinions.com/mvie-review-7EFD-137451AA-3A0AF6BA-prod2
Lyrics
http://miran.pecenik.com/ts/pinkfloyd/thewall/lyrics.htm
Tracy {sorry no spell check}

messages.subject: Re: Cool free stickers
messages.msgSnippet: ... {got ... My 9yo was just saying that that needs to be the theme song for the movie about our family that she s planning!  After watching The O Keefes for
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "Tracy" <sablehs@y...>
wrote:

> Thanks, haven't seen them yet. We need some to quote Pink Floyd
{got
> me in the mood and I'm listening to them now } Need some for
> unschooling Bumperstickers that say "We Don't Need No Education, We
> Don't Need No Thought Control" <EG>
> Tracy

My 9yo was just saying that that needs to be the theme song for the
movie about our family that she's planning! After watching "The
O'Keefes" for several weeks, she figures we're much more exciting and
deserve a feature film.

Holly

messages.subject: Re: Cool free stickers
messages.msgSnippet: ... with saying ... Suck? ... HREF= http://www.youthpower.net/merchandise.html http://www.youthpowe r.net/merchandise.html Thanks, haven t seen them yet.
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, KathrynJB@a... wrote:
> If you go to this site, you (or your teen) can get cool stickers
with saying
> like "School is Stupid" and bumperstickers that say "Does School
Suck?"
> <A
HREF="http://www.youthpower.net/merchandise.html">http://www.youthpowe
r.net/merchandise.html</A>


Thanks, haven't seen them yet. We need some to quote Pink Floyd {got
me in the mood and I'm listening to them now } Need some for
unschooling Bumperstickers that say "We Don't Need No Education, We
Don't Need No Thought Control" <EG>
Tracy

messages.subject: Cool free stickers
messages.msgSnippet: If you go to this site, you (or your teen) can get cool stickers with saying like School is Stupid and bumperstickers that say Does School Suck?
messages.messageBody:
If you go to this site, you (or your teen) can get cool stickers with saying
like "School is Stupid" and bumperstickers that say "Does School Suck?"
<A HREF="http://www.youthpower.net/merchandise.html">http://www.youthpower.net/merchandise.html</A>

They also have tee shirts, Holt, Gatto, and Llewellyn books, etc.

Kathryn
